name: Spinner Evolution - Merge It!
description:
Collect, fuse and evolve Fidget Spinners! Start off with a basic orange Fidget Spinner and work your way up to the top! If you're looking for the best Fidget Spinner game, you've found it!

FEATURES

+ Fuse Fidget Spinners together and discover new ones
+ Complete your 'My Spinners' collection with 100+ unique Spinners
+ Use the power of boosts to supercharge your earnings
+ Participate in events to help with your collection

Enjoy the game? Please leave a review and tell us what you'd like to see in the next update. We read *every single* review!
